scripts.demo: yarn install:all && yarn build:once && yarn demo:run
scripts.install:all: if [ ! -d ./node_modules/yarn/ ]; then npm run install:yarn; fi && yarn install
scripts.bump:yarn: yarn git:clean && rm yarn.lock test/yarn.lock && yarn && (cd test/ && yarn) && git commit -am 'bump yarn.lock' || exit 0
scripts.bump:version: yarn git:clean && (cd src/ && npm version patch) && git commit -am 'release new minor' && git show HEAD
scripts.release: yarn git:clean && yarn bump:yarn && yarn release:build && yarn test && yarn release:publish
scripts.release:build: yarn clean:all && yarn install && yarn build:once && yarn build:umd
scripts.git:clean: bash -c 'if [[ `git status --porcelain` ]]; then echo [Error] Uncommited changes. && exit 1; fi'
